Bike to school : Harding and Garfield middle schools in Lakewood will celebrate National Bike to School Day on Wednesday by encouraging students to ride their bicycles to school .
Bike to school : Harding and Garfield middle schools in Lakewood will celebrate National Bike to School Day on Wednesday by encouraging students to ride their bicycles to school .
More than 200 middle school students are expected to ride their bikes , along with parents , teachers and community leaders .
Bike - to - School Day is presented by Bike Lakewood with assistance from the schools and city .
The city of Lakewood has posted details and safety tips on its website .
Architect community meetings : The Lakewood school district has scheduled a second round of community meetings for the three elementary schools to be rebuilt beginning this fall .
Architect Rodwell King will give updates on the design and transition process .

The dates are : Lincoln , Wednesday , May 21 , 6:30 p.m. ; Roosevelt , Tuesday , June 3 , 7 p.m. , and Grant , Wednesday , June 4 , 7 p.m. The Lakewood school district posted information on its website .
